title: PIC: Emo Adams shares adorable family photo
text:
PIC: Emo Adams shares adorable family photo share this

Johannesburg – TV personality Emo Adams shared an adorable photo on Instagram showing off his beautiful family.

The star, who was announced as the new host of popular SABC 2 game show Noot vir Noot in April, posted the picture of himself with wife Michelle Gildenhuys and their four little boys on Sunday, writing: "I know I work late nights. I know My time is not always yours. I know I can't always play with you. I know I sometimes work too hard. But anything for those smiles."

The picture shows the family dressed in blue and white and gathered on a bed as they smile for the camera.

Baby Khai, who was welcomed into the world just four months ago, is seen wrapped up snuggly in a tiny blanket as his brother cradles him.
